quoteText:
Uber may assign these Terms without your consent to: (i) a subsidiary or affiliate.
(ii) an acquirer of Uber's equity, business or assets.
or (iii) a successor by merger.
title: Uber can transfer the TOS to affiliates and successors without your consent

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
tosdr.tldr: Uber can transfer the TOS to affiliates and successors without your consent.
